member.name: T:UltraFaceDotNet.DisposableObject
member.summary: Represents a class which has managed or unmanaged resources.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.DisposableObject.IsDisposed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance has been disposed.
member.returns: true if this instance has been disposed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:UltraFaceDotNet.DisposableObject.ThrowIfDisposed
member.summary: If this object is disposed, then is thrown.

member.name: M:UltraFaceDotNet.DisposableObject.DisposeManaged
member.summary: Releases all managed resources.

member.name: M:UltraFaceDotNet.DisposableObject.DisposeUnmanaged
member.summary: Releases all unmanaged resources.

member.summary: Releases all resources used by this .

member.summary: Releases all resources used by this .
member.param: Indicate value whether method was called.

member.name: T:UltraFaceDotNet.FaceInfo
member.summary: Describes the location of a face. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.FaceInfo.X1
member.summary: Gets the x-axis value of the left side of the rectangle of face.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.FaceInfo.Y1
member.summary: Gets the y-axis value of the top of the rectangle of face.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.FaceInfo.X2
member.summary: Gets the x-axis value of the right side of the rectangle of face.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.FaceInfo.Y2
member.summary: Gets the y-axis value of the bottom of the rectangle of face.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.FaceInfo.Score
member.summary: Gets the score of the rectangle of face.

member.name: T:UltraFaceDotNet.NonMaximumSuppressionMode
member.summary: Specifies the mode of Non Maximum Suppression.

member.name: F:UltraFaceDotNet.NonMaximumSuppressionMode.Hard
member.summary: Specifies that the hard nms.

member.name: F:UltraFaceDotNet.NonMaximumSuppressionMode.Blending
member.summary: Specifies that the blending nms. The mix nms was been proposed in paper blaze face, aims to minimize the temporal jitter.

member.name: T:UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFace
member.summary: Provides the method to find face methods. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFace.Create(UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFaceParameter)
member.summary: Create a new instance of the class with the specified parameter.
member.exception: The model binary file is null or whitespace. Or the param file is null or whitespace.
The model binary file is not found. Or the param file is not found.

member.name: M:UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFace.Detect(NcnnDotNet.Mat)
member.summary: Returns an enumerable collection of face location correspond to all faces in specified image.
member.param: The image contains faces. The image can contain multiple faces.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of face location correspond to all faces in specified image.

member.name: M:UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFace.DisposeUnmanaged
member.summary: Releases all unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFaceParameter
member.summary: Represents a parameter of . This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFaceParameter.BinFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path of the model binary file.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFaceParameter.ParamFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the file path of the param file.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFaceParameter.InputWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the pixel width after resized input image.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFaceParameter.InputLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the pixel height after resized input image.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFaceParameter.NumThread
member.summary: Gets or sets the count of threads for processing of neural network. The default is 4.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFaceParameter.ScoreThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the score threshold for detecting face. The default is 0.7f.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFaceParameter.IouThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the IoU (Intersection Of Union) threshold for detecting face. The default is 0.3f.

member.name: P:UltraFaceDotNet.UltraFaceParameter.TopK
member.summary: Gets or sets the upper limit of detecting face. The default is -1.
